title: ['Adobe can’t Photoshop out the fact its $20bn Figma deal is a naked land grab - The Guardian', 'Figma Is Making Billions Off Its Sale to Adobe. Is It Enough to Keep ... - Observer', 'Why Adobe Is Paying $20 Billion for Figma - The Motley Fool', 'Adobe Stock: Bear vs. Bull - The Motley Fool', 'Adobe Product Chief on Why Its Figma Competitor, Adobe XD, Failed - Business Insider']
summary:
['The big tech news in a slow week was that the software giant Adobe is planning to pay the unconscionable sum of $20bn (£18bn) to acquire a small company called Figma.
Adobe dominates the market in software for creating and publishing digital and printed material – graphics, photography, illustration, animation, multimedia/video, motion pictures and print.
If you’ve ever used Photoshop, Illustrator, Acrobat Reader or opened a pdf (portable document format), then you’ve used an Adobe product.
If a customer uses Adobe Photoshop or Illustrator, well, that’s fine by Figma.
So whether the FTC allows Adobe’s land grab of Figma will be a good test of whether the US government has acquired that wisdom.', 'Adobe’s purchase of design company Figma for $20 billion last week, the software company’s largest-ever acquisition, represents a windfall for Figma employees and investors who joined early.
Field has spoken about giving employees “permission to have fun,” and at the start of the pandemic, Figma workers even took a week to write, produce, and perform a musical.
With the acquisition, the 850 employees who currently work at Figma will be absorbed into a software company that counts more than 28,000 workers worldwide.
In recent years Figma emerged as a primary challenger to Adobe, which offers similar design tools.
He added that Figma and Adobe seem to be very different organizations from the outside, “and the motivations that pushed an employee to join Figma may not be true anymore” after an acquisition.', "Let's examine why Adobe has decided to shell out $20 billion for Figma, a web-based collaborative design platform, and whether the market's harsh response to this news was warranted.
The remainder of the $20 billion will be paid in stock.
It will likely be several years before Figma starts boosting Adobe's annual earnings, even if sales growth will accelerate almost immediately.
And owning Figma next year will speed its annual sales growth again, just as it was dipping to nearly 10%.
The $20 billion price tag might seem high at first blush, especially with economic growth slowing and a recession potentially on the way.", "What the bears will tell you about AdobeDuring the quarter, Adobe generated 73% of its revenue from its Digital Media segment, which houses its Creative and Document Clouds.
Adobe bears will point out that after generating more than 20% year-over-sales growth across both segments in 2021, its revenue growth decelerated significantly in the first nine months of fiscal 2022.
That's a staggering 50 times the $400 million in annual recurring revenue Adobe expects Figma to generate this year.
Adobe spent $4.8 billion on stock buybacks in the first nine months of 2022, which reduced its outstanding share count by nearly 2% year over year.
Lastly, Adobe's stock has gotten a lot cheaper.", "Before acquiring Figma, Adobe had a similar product, Adobe XD, that failed to take off.
That's one of the main reasons Adobe wants to join forces with Figma, Scott Belsky, Adobe's chief product officer, told Insider.
He acknowledges that Adobe's rival tool for product design, called Adobe XD, wasn't successful.
Why Adobe XD never took offAdobe created Adobe XD in 2016 because it saw a lot of people using Photoshop for website building.
As a desktop product, XD used local files and wasn't collaborative."]

title: ['Better Software Stock: Adobe vs. Unity - The Motley Fool']
summary:
['Adobe (ADBE -6.35%) and Unity (U -1.26%) might initially seem like two very different types of software companies.
Adobe develops a wide range of cloud-based design, document, and enterprise software, while Unity mainly provides development and monetization tools for game developers.
That expansion could eventually make Unity a more diversified provider of cloud-based digital design tools like Adobe.
Both stocks hit their all-time highs last November, but subsequently crashed as rising interest rates drove investors away from pricier growth stocks.
More importantly, Adobe should remain firmly profitable as Unity continues to bleed red ink in this unforgiving market for unprofitable growth stocks.']

['RED BLUFF — Supplies were ready Saturday for anyone wanting to learn how to illustrate and identify the Western Bluebird at the William B. Ide Adobe State Historic Park in Red Bluff.
The park picked the Western Bluebird because they have been spotted in the area mostly during the afternoon.
After learning to draw the Western Bluebird, Park Interpreter Jennifer Pooley helped people spot some birds and downloaded the Merlin Bird ID app, an online bird-identifying service.
This event was possible through the newly launched Art in the Park program, which Pooley describes as another way to invite people to the parks and engage with them.
The park will have a story event geared toward children on Oct. 8.', '', '']

title: ['Adobe Target Adds AI-Powered Personalization Features - Destination CRM']
summary:
["Adobe Target Adds AI-Powered Personalization FeaturesAdobe has added artificial intelligence-powered personalization enhancements so users can leverage filtering and intelligence to directly impact the business metrics that matter most on a per activity basis.
These new features include custom models within AI-Personalization Activities, enhanced activity alerts, and a beta launch of an integration with Adobe Real-Time CDP for omnichannel attribute scoring in AI-powered personalization.
Adobe also announced a beta release of Adobe Real-Time CDP attributes and high-value segments in Automated Personalization and Auto-Target activities.
This expands the data available for Adobe Target's algorithms to evaluate for more precise personalization.
Adobe Target also offers new alerts within the user interface of Pulse 2.0, the reporting system shared across Adobe Experience Cloud applications, as well as the ability to trigger emails on activity progress, including activity launches, issues, and results."]

For more information you can review our Terms of Service and Cookie Policy.', 'Two weeks after Adobe’s agreement to purchase Figma for $20 billion, Kaleidos, the company behind open source design program Penpot, said that it had raised $8 million in fresh funding.
13 days have passed since Adobe revealed its intention to invest $20 billion in Figma, the company behind well-known design tools.
If the acquisition goes through as expected in 2023, Dylan Field, co-founder and CEO of Figma, will continue to lead the company, according to Adobe.
Figma has attracted some designers away from Adobe’s Creative Cloud tools at first thanks to features like straightforward sharing and collaborative editing.
In a discussion on Twitter Spaces, product chief Scott Belsky stated that Adobe is dedicated to helping users of XD.', 'Global uncertainty — defined as the occurrence of unplanned news or events, globally and in the workplace — is hindering employees from getting work done.
On the plus side, constant change equals constant innovationUncertainty is fueling business innovation and new ways of collaboration.
One in four SMB leaders feel that innovation has become a core business value over the past year.
71% of SMB leaders and 81% of ENT managers say in the next year, the culture at their organization will be more digitized than ever before.
Methodology for Adobe’s reportEdelman Data and Intelligence conducted a 20-minute survey among enterprise employees, enterprise managers, SMB leaders and SMB employees in eight global markets, fielded July 11–August 6, 2022.', 'The adobe originally stood near the modern-day corner of Palm Canyon Drive and Tahquitz Canyon Way, walking distance to the Agua Caliente Hot Mineral Spring; it was moved to its current site in the 1950s.
The sunbaked bricks used to form the structure were made by Cahuilla Indians using a mix of mud, fiber, and ancient water from the hot spring, itself known for curative properties.
Plan Your VisitAdmission to the McCallum Adobe and Cornelia White House is free.
The structures are located at Village Green Heritage Center in downtown Palm Springs.
After closing for the summer, the museums reopen this month.', 'Zoner Photo Studio X is a holistic solution to post-processing and file management for photographers, and yet it flies under the radar.
I first tried Zoner Photo Studio X around 18 months ago for an article on Fstoppers.
However, there are elements that put ZPS X ahead of Adobe's suite.
Unlike the usual full-screen viewer, you also get all of the ZPS X UI elements while in "full" view, giving it higher utility.
You can download and try Zoner Photo Studio X free for one month by clicking here.']

title: ['Daniel Durn Is The CFO and Executive VP of Finance of Adobe Inc ... - Nasdaq', 'Adobe Photoshop 2022 wins software of the year in the Creative ... - Creative Bloq', 'Adobe Photoshop & Premiere Elements 2023: Faster Speeds, AI ... - Business Insider', "Adobe Promises Not to Ditch Figma's Free Plan or Ruin Its Simplicity - PCMag", "Adobe vows to continue offering Figma's free plan if its buyout is approved - Engadget", 'Adobe appoints Katrina Troughton as vice president and managing ... - Mediaweek', 'Spanish startup Penpot raises $8M after Adobe acquired rival Figma ... - Tech Funding News']
summary:
['In total, Adobe insiders sold more than they bought over the last year.
It is certainly not great to see that insiders have sold shares in the company.
You can see a visual depiction of insider transactions (by companies and individuals) over the last 12 months, below.
While we wait, check out this free list of growing companies with considerable, recent, insider buying.
So What Does This Data Suggest About Adobe Insiders?', "If you're looking for more software intel, check out our guide to the best graphic design tools available right now.
Software of the year: Adobe Photoshop 2022(opens in new tab) You probably don't need us to tell you that Adobe Photoshop is the industry-standard software for image editing – and Photoshop 2022 is so good at so many things it's hard not to recommend buying it.
Find out more in our Adobe Photoshop 2022 review.
Best video editing software: Davinci Resolve 18(opens in new tab) DaVinci Resolve is powerful video editing software, and version 18 is even more intuitive and streamlined.
The 3D software is perfect for animation – whether it’s simple keyframing or complex walk-cycles, the tool allows artists to turn their still characters into incredibly impressive animations.", "Adobe's Photoshop Elements and Premiere Elements 2023 add creative features that require no editing experience.
Photoshop Elements 2023 and Premiere Elements 2023 cost $100 each or bundled for $150.
You can also upgrade from any previous version for $80 for either Photoshop Elements or Premiere Elements, or both for $120.
Adobe Photoshop Elements 2023 & Premiere Elements 2023 For the 2023 version, Adobe Photoshop Elements and Premiere Elements have been optimized for faster performance, especially on Apple M1 computers.
Improved performance on Apple M1 computersAdobe said Photoshop Elements and Premiere Elements 2023 have faster launch times — up to 70% — on Macs that use Apple's M1 processor.", 'In an interview with Bloomberg(Opens in a new window), Adobe Chief Product Officer Scott Belsky confirmed none of those things are going to happen.
Belsky said Adobe realizes Figma customers appreciate its simplicity and it isn't going to mess with that.
Another key commitment: nobody will require an Adobe Creative Cloud subscription in order to work on a Figma document.
One comment that may surprise Adobe customers relates to how unclear the future is for Adobe XD now.
XD competes with Figma, and Belsky admits Adobe will "have to reevaluate where we want to shift our resources and focus" once the Figma deal is completed.', "Adobe vows to continue offering Figma's free plan if its buyout is approved The company said it's adding its apps' technologies to Figma and adopting some its collaborative features.
Figma co-founder Dylan Field added that Adobe isn't planning any price increase and that the platform will remain free for education.
According to Belsky, though, any update Adobe rolls out won't be obstructive and won't make it difficult to navigate the platform's interface.
The company plans to adopt Figma's collaborative features and may build multi-user web platforms for its programs.
There is one Adobe program that might not survive the acquisition: Figma's direct competitor Adobe XD.", 'Adobe announced the appointment of Katrina Troughton as vice president and managing director of Adobe Australia and New Zealand (ANZ).
In this role, Troughton will lead Adobe’s business and operations across Adobe Experience Cloud, Adobe Creative Cloud, and Adobe Document Cloud, reporting to Simon Tate, Adobe’s President for Asia Pacific (APAC).
“Katrina is an experienced and creative outcome-focused leader with a proven track record of delivering results and transforming businesses for sustainable growth.
With a track record built on innovation, category leadership, and rapidly expanding market opportunity, Adobe is well positioned for continued growth.
In this role, Troughton was also responsible for the development and implementation of IBM’s first Reconciliation Action Plan (RAP).', 'Adobe’s announcement in mid-September of its intention to acquire Figma for $20B shocked the design industry, not all of them positive.
13 days have passed since Adobe revealed its decision and now Penpot, an open-source substitute, has experienced a surge in activity during that time.
As an open-source company, we also want to ensure there is always a free alternative for everyone.
Taiga, its other open-source project, is used by over a million people worldwide, including companies such as HP, Red Hat, and Tata.
Taiga’s business model includes a generous free tier, SaaS on top of the open source project, and options for self-hosted or managed on-premise deployments.']

Adobe InDesign ‘Publish Online’ loading slowAccording to reports, multiple users have had to wait a long time for their documents to be uploaded to the web through the ‘Publish Online’ feature.
Publish Online Extremely slow InDesign 17.4 Hi, since a couple of days loading of our published documents is extremely slow.
SourceThe problem with documents loading slow through ‘Publish Online’ is reportedly happening in all web browsers after the update to InDesign v17.4.', "What happenedShares of Adobe (ADBE -6.35%) plunged by 26.3% in September, according to data provided by S&P Global Market Intelligence.
With this tumble, the share price of the software company has been cut in half year to date.
The company agreed to acquire Figma, a collaborative design platform, for a princely sum of $20 billion with a mix of cash and stock.
Investors will also be waiting to see how the company integrates Figma, and whether the announced synergies can take place to lift Adobe's top and bottom lines.
At a valuation of close to 30 times its annualized earnings, the stock still seems expensive, but is less so compared to a year ago.", "Adobe Photoshop and Premiere Elements 2023 launch5 October 2022Adobe has announced updates to its Photoshop Elements and Premiere Elements editing software, the baby siblings to the 'full-blown' professional apps Lightroom and Photoshop.
Image: AdobeThe major updates are focussed on Adobe's Sensei AI-powered features, including more streamlined editing tools and enhanced animation features.
AI enhanced sky replacement is now included with Photoshop Elements.
AI advancements for photos and videos, which let users add moving elements to photos.
You can read more about the updates to Photoshop Elements and Premiere Elements on Adobe's website.", 'Adobe Chromium Embedded Framework Helper or Adobe CEF Helper is a vital process needed by Adobe Creative Cloud applications.
Adobe also offers a chat support service for anyone experiencing high memory or CPU usage issues due to Adobe CEF Helper.
Use Creative Cloud Uninstaller to repair broken files or reinstall the Adobe Creative CloudDownload Creative Cloud Uninstaller that complements your Windows OS version.
Completely end Adobe CEF Helper tasks via PowerShell to stop CPU usageSearch for the PowerShell on your Windows Search.
This will prevent Adobe CEF Helper from launching, meaning your CPU will no longer be used for Adobe Creative Cloud-related processes.', "The company reported record revenue of $4.43 billion, up 13% year-over-year.
The Digital Media segment, which includes the Creative and Document Clouds, accounted for 73% of Adobe's revenue, while the Digital Experience segment, which includes enterprise-oriented marketing, analytics and digital workflow services, accounted for 25% of revenue.
Adobe announced on Sept. 15 that it has agreed to pay $20 billion to acquire the design and collaboration software company.
Adobe anticipates paying $10 billion in cash and $10 billion in stock for the acquisition.
The company currently has approximately $5.7 billion in cash and investments, which is offset by $4.13 billion in debt, and it generated $1.7 billion in cash from operations in the fiscal third quarter.", 'With yet another collaborative effort with Concepts in the works, it’s clear Nike SB has big plans for 2023.

(Side note: “Love on Tour” continues in 2023 with dates in Australia—and Europe once again.)', 'Originally written as a radio piece in honor of Queen Mary’s birthday, “The Mousetrap” is the longest running play in the world.
Agatha Christie’s iconic murder mystery about a group of strangers trapped during a snowstorm opens at the Adobe Theater on Friday, Oct. 14.

['Adobe announced it has entered into a definitive merger agreement to acquire Figma, a web-first collaborative design platform, for approximately $20 billion in cash and stock.
The combination of Adobe and Figma will usher in a new era of collaborative creativity.
“The combination of Adobe and Figma is transformational and will accelerate our vision for collaborative creativity.”Adobe and Figma share a passion for helping individuals and teams be more creative and productive.
“Figma has built a phenomenal product design platform on the web,” said David Wadhwani, president of Adobe’s Digital Media business.
Under the definitive agreement, Adobe has agreed to acquire Figma for approximately $20 billion, comprised of approximately half cash and half stock, subject to customary adjustments.', '', 'Adobe Acrobat Reader DC software is the free, trusted standard for viewing, printing, signing, and annotating PDFs.
Adobe Document Cloud is a revolutionary, modern and efficient way to get work done with documents in the office, at home or on-the-go.
At the heart of Document Cloud is the all-new Adobe Acrobat DC, which will take e-signatures mainstream by delivering free e-signing with every individual subscription.
Adobe Acrobat Reader DC new feature highlights:Work with PDFs from anywhere with the new, free Acrobat DC mobile app for Android or iOS.
Download: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC 64-bit | 387.0 MB (Freeware)Download: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC 32-bit | 319.0 MBLink: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC Home Page | Release Notes | ScreenshotGet alerted to all of our Software updates on Twitter at @NeowinSoftware', 'The most urgent of the patches cover security defects in ColdFusion versions 2021 and 2018.
According to an Adobe critical-rated advisory, a total of 13 ColdFusion flaws were fixed, including some carrying a CVSS 9.8/10 severity rating.
Adobe also released patches to cover a half-dozen flaws affecting the widely deployed Adobe Acrobat and Reader software.
Adobe has released security updates for Adobe Acrobat and Reader for Windows and macOS.
Related: Fortinet Confirms Zero-Day Vulnerability Exploited in One AttackRelated: Microsoft Dismisses False Reports About End of Patch TuesdayRelated: Patch Tuesday: Microsoft Calls Attention to ‘Wormable’ Windows Flaw']

title: ['Adobe Releases Security Updates for Multiple Products - CISA', 'Adobe Partners With Bowie State to Drive Equity in Digital Skills for ... - Bowie State University', 'Adobe Digital Price Index: Online Prices Fall 0.2% in September - Business Wire']
summary:
['Adobe has released security updates to address multiple vulnerabilities in Adobe software.
An attacker can exploit some of these vulnerabilities to take control of an affected system.
CISA encourages users and administrators to review Adobe Security Bulletins and apply the necessary updates.
• Adobe Cold Fusion APSB22-44• Adobe Acrobat and Reader APSB22-46• Adobe Commerce and Magneto Open Source APSB22-48• Adobe Dimension APSB22-57', '– Bowie State University, the first Historically Black College or University (HBCU) in Maryland, is one of three minority-serving institutions selected by the Adobe Foundation to receive $1 million as part of an expanded effort to advance initiatives to make learning digital skills more equitable and enable success of diverse student from underinvested communities.
Adobe also identified Winston-Salem State University, another HBCU, and San José State University, a designated Hispanic Serving Institution (HSI), as partners in the effort to develop unique solutions that expose students to careers in tech and prepare them with the necessary creativity and digital skills.
BSU, designated a National Center for Academic Excellence in Cyber Defense education, continues to expand programs in this area.
The yearlong hybrid internship program will provide select BSU students with hands-on cybersecurity experience and professional development from Adobe to prepare them for careers in the cybersecurity workforce.
The university places special emphasis on the science, technology, cybersecurity, teacher education, business and nursing disciplines within the context of a liberal arts education.', 'SAN JOSE, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Today, Adobe (Nasdaq:ADBE) announced the latest online inflation data from the Adobe Digital Price Index (DPI), powered by Adobe Analytics.
In September 2022, online prices fell 0.2% year-over-year (YoY) while rising 0.8% month-over-month (MoM).
Prices for computers also fell significantly and decreased 14.1% YoY (down 1.9% MoM), greater than the month prior when prices fell 12.6% YoY.
MethodologyThe DPI is modeled after the Consumer Price Index (CPI), published by the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics and uses the Fisher Price Index to track online prices.
Adobe and the Adobe logo are either registered trademarks or trademarks of Adobe in the United States and/or other countries.']

title: ['Economic instability, inflation a major concern for Indian workforce, Adobe warns - Business Today', 'Get the edge for your creative practice: register for Adobe MAX ... - Creative Boom', 'Adobe Bringing Substance 3D Modeler And More To Quest Next Year - UploadVR', 'Adobe Photoshop rival, Microsoft “Designer” is here for free - Gizchina.com']
summary:
['For Indian employees, economic instability and inflation are currently a major concern, according to The Future of Time report by American software company Adobe.
The study said that more than 70 per cent of Indian workers said that these were major concerns in addition to new COVID-19 variants developing in the future.
Around 84 per cent employees also reported that uncertainty has required them to innovate in their positions such as utilizing new processes and creative problem-solving approaches.
“Persistent global uncertainty is changing the ways managers and employees spend and prioritize their time, taking a toll on their productivity and efficiency, and decreasing job satisfaction.
Nearly 72 per cent SMB leaders and 65 per cent enterprise managers invested in digital technologies or in-house tech to support employees during uncertainty in the past year, Adobe said.', "From Photoshop to Premiere Pro, Illustrator to XD, Adobe software is at the beating heart of the creative profession.
Adobe Chief Product Officer and Executive Vice President, Creative Cloud Scott Belsky at Adobe MaxFast-track your way into lettering!
This session by digital storyteller and former Adobe Creative Resident Hallease Narvaez will help you navigate the various colour features built into Adobe Premiere Pro.
She'll cover different project settings for working with various gammas of footage, the different ways Premiere Pro interprets footage, and how best to work with Auto Color.
All this is just a small taster of the sessions you can enjoy by registering for Adobe Max.", 'ADDuring its annual Connect conference yesterday Meta announced a partnership with Adobe that will bring several of the company’s creative tools and programs to Quest 2 and Quest Pro.
Zuckerberg also announced a partnership with Adobe to bring some of its apps and tools onto the Quest ecosystem.
“Next year, [Adobe] will begin releasing a suite of apps [on Quest headsets] for professional 3D creators, designers and artists,” said Zuckerberg during the keynote.
This includes Adobe’s Substance 3D Modeler software, currently in beta for Windows and PC VR.
Notably, the software began its life as Oculus Medium, a sculpting tool for PC VR, before being acquired by Adobe and rebranded to Substance 3D Modeler last year.', 'Microsoft Designer will provide a free version as well as a high-end version.
Microsoft’s design software is targeting another dominant design software in the industry, “Canva”.
Microsoft Designer to take on CanvaA Microsoft spokesman said Designer was originally aimed at ordinary individual users.
Microsoft Vs AdobeWill Microsoft Designer affect its relationship with Adobe?
Features of Microsoft DesignerAccording to Liat Ben-Zur, Microsoft VP, Microsoft Designer can use templates to quickly design and process.']

title: ['Two-thirds of Australians expect personalisation for sharing data with brands: Adobe - Mumbrella', 'Bold Art and Commanding Colors Wow in This Milan Adobe - Architectural Digest', 'Adobe Premiere Pro vs Adobe Premiere Elements - TechRadar', 'How to download Dreamweaver for free or with Adobe Creative Cloud - Creative Bloq', 'How to use Adobe Creative Cloud Cleaner Tool - TheWindowsClub']
summary:
['In exchange for sharing data with brands, almost two-thirds (64%) of Australian consumers expect a personalised experience and more than half (51%) want real-time offers relevant to them, according to an Adobe report.
More than one in two Australians (59%) think negatively of brands that use broad assumptions and stereotypes, including age-based labels, to engage with them.
ADVERTISEMENTThis also sets certain expectations around brands as one in two (48%) Australians expect companies to know them and keep pace with their preferences.
62% of Australians said they have changed their favourite brands as their tastes and financial situation has changed.
“To meet that standard, brands need to unlock preferences in real-time through customer data and use it to deliver relevant interactions and content at the right moment.', 'The building that now houses the restaurant was once lived in by the caretaker who looked after the neighboring Naviglio Canal.
Motelombroso is an oasis of peace where visitors can escape from the city for a few hours.
Just as important for Alessandra and Matteo, Motelombroso is also their home.
“During the work we brought back some original elements such as some of the interior walls.
“I worked with Stefano Bongiorno on the interior design, creating custom pieces and relying on artisans from Piedmont to execute them.', "In this article, we compare Adobe Premiere Pro (opens in new tab) and Adobe Premiere Elements (opens in new tab) to help you decide.
We've also compared Adobe Premiere Pro vs Apple Final Cut Pro and Premiere Pro vs Lightworks.
Adobe Premiere Elements also comes with a wealth of options for text, but not quite as many as Premiere Pro.
Apart from these obvious differences, it is also worth noting that Adobe Premiere Pro can work with more file types and render more file formats than Adobe Premiere Elements.
Adobe Premiere Pro, on the other hand, requires you to purchase a monthly subscription to Adobe Creative Cloud.", "In our guide, we'll show you how to do so for free, as part of a free trial, or as part of an Adobe Creative Cloud subscription.
(opens in new tab) Download a free trial of Dreamweaver for PC or Mac (opens in new tab)Try the latest release of Dreamweaver free with a seven-day trial from Adobe.
Yes, you can download Adobe Dreamweaver free, in the form of a free trial.
A free trial is the only way to download Dreamweaver for free without breaking the law.
If this is your first time installing any Creative Cloud app, the Creative Cloud desktop app will install at the same time.", 'How to use Adobe Creative Cloud Cleaner ToolThe Adobe creative cloud cleaner tool is for users with more advanced computer knowledge.
Checklist before using Adobe Creative Cloud Cleaner ToolTo avoid potential data loss there are a few things to do before running the Adobe creative cloud cleaner tool.
Using the Adobe Creative Cloud Cleaner ToolTo begin using the Adobe creative cloud cleaner tool, you will have to download it.
When the Creative cloud cleaner tool has been successfully run, you can then reinstall the Creative Cloud or Creative Suite apps.
In order to clean your Adobe Creative Cloud, you need to use the Adobe Creative Cloud Cleaner Tool.']

title: ['How to Center Text in a Table in Adobe InDesign - How-To Geek']
summary:
['Center text horizontally by selecting the Type Tool and selecting "Align Center" under Paragraph.
To center text vertically, you will need to adjust the Vertical Justification setting in the Cell Options window.
Adobe InDesign has so many sophisticated features that even something as seemingly simple as centering text in a table can feel overwhelming.
Horizontally Center Text in a TableThe option to horizontally center your text in a table is easy to locate.
RELATED: How to Curve Text in Adobe PhotoshopVertically Center Text in a TableThe option to center align text vertically in a cell of a table is a little more hidden.']

title: ['Adobe: Success Story of the Digital King is Worth Looking at - Analytics Insight', 'Man shot dead on Del Cerro road - FOX 5 San Diego']
summary:
['One of their most impressive moves was transitioning from a licensed software company to a completely cloud-based company.
The firm’s flagship offering in its digital media business is Adobe Creative Cloud, which allows customers to download the latest version of Adobe Creative Suite products.
The firm also continues to focus on digital marketing solutions.
Recurring revenue streams provide ample visibility as it concerns Adobe’s future financial performance and results in stronger cash flow profiles.
Adobe Marketing Cloud is becoming a favorite of Chief Marketing Officers, as digital marketing bookings continue to expand at a nice clip.', 'San Diego police investigate the shooting death of a man on Adobe Falls Road in Del Cerro on Oct. 16, 2022.
SAN DIEGO — San Diego police responded to a 9-1-1 call around 1 a.m. Sunday, indicating a man was down in the street on the 5700 block of Adobe Falls Road, according to a press release from Lt. Adam T. Sharki.
Officers performed life-saving measures until San Diego Fire-Rescue personnel arrived on the scene.
San Diego police vehicles are pictured on the scene of an apparent homicide by shooting on Adobe Falls Road.
Officials say it’s too early into the investigation to know what circumstances led to the apparent homicide and there’s no suspect information to be released.']

title: ['Meet the inaugural 2022 Adobe Creators to Watch - Fast Company', 'Adobe Stock (NASDAQ:ADBE): Why Concerns Over Figma are ... - Nasdaq', 'More Than 50% of Nonprofessional U.S. Creators Now Monetize Their Content, Adobe Study Finds - Variety', 'Adobe courts SMBs with the help of Etsy, Meta, Mastercard - ZDNet', 'Enterprise Document Management System Market Recovery and ... - Digital Journal']
summary:
['', "Investors of ADBE stock have enjoyed several years of massive returns, but the last few months haven't been easy.
The Figma acquisition has been met with mixed reviews so far.
Moreover, the Figma takeover is expected to bring in $400 million in recurring sales by the end of the year.
The average ADBE stock price target is $373.30, implying 27.2% upside potential.
The concerns surrounding the acquisition are understandable, but we feel that Adobe's acquisition wasn't wrong.", 'Adobe’s “Future of Creativity” study, released Monday, examined how nonprofessional creators — who engage in creative activities as a hobby or side pursuit, in contrast to full-time creators — are monetizing their content.
The study found that almost half of non-professional creators (48%) now earn money from their creative activities, with higher percentages in Brazil (59%), the U.S. (53%), Germany (51%), U.K. (51%) and South Korea (51%).
Additionally, according to the study, creators are optimistic about the growing metaverse: 68% of creators expect the metaverse will bring new job opportunities in the future.
Monetizers across all creative activities earn at least $43 per hour — six times the U.S. minimum wage ($7.25/hour).
77% of creators say they’ve explored the metaverse at least once, and 34% say they’re already participating weekly, through early metaverse experiences including gaming, socializing, and shopping.', 'This should help them create better product listings, as well as content like promotional design graphics, social media content and logos.
Meanwhile, Adobe has partnered with Meta to launch "Express Your Brand" – a training program that offers free education and tools to help SMBs grow their visibility online.
Tools like Adobe Express are being updated with new features tailored for SMBs.
Adobe Express, for instance, is making it easier for SMBs to manage social media content with features like content scheduling and color palette recommendations.
Additionally, new Adobe Acrobat integrations enable SMBs to design content like cover pages and section dividers.', 'New Jersey, United States, Oct 17, 2022 /DigitalJournal/ The Enterprise Document Management Systems Market research report provides all the information related to the industry.
This Enterprise Document Management Systems market research report tracks all the recent developments and innovations in the market.
An analysis of the current market designs and other basic characteristics is provided in the Enterprise Document Management Systems report.
The in-depth market segmentation analysis helps identify the prevailing market opportunities.
In the end, this Enterprise Document Management Systems report helps to save you time and money by delivering unbiased information under one roof.']

title: ['Adobe Wants Photoshop to Be More Like New Acquisition Figma - Bloomberg', 'Adobe Premiere Pro Version 23.0 - Newsshooter', 'Adobe Partners With Leica and Nikon To Implement Content ... - Business Wire', 'Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Netflix, United Airlines, Adobe and more - CNBC', 'Teams will let users set Adobe Acrobat as a default PDF viewer soon - OnMSFT.com', 'New Adobe software tools aim to aid 3D content creation for ... - Reuters', 'Adobe stock jumps on estimates for next year as strong dollar cuts into growth - CNBC', 'Adobe adds Selectable Track Mattes, native H.264 to After Effects - Photofocus', 'Adobe: 70% of Australian influencers look to the metaverse for business opportunities - Mumbrella', 'Adobe 3D, le novità per le esperienze immersive e il metaverso - 01Net', 'Adobe Introduces New Collaboration Capabilities In Creative Cloud ... - Business Wire', 'Adobe announces the first cameras to support Frame.io direct RAW uploads - Engadget', "Fujifilm announces collaboration with Adobe to Offer the World's ... - Fujifilm"]
summary:
['Why did this happen?
Please make sure your browser supports JavaScript and cookies and that you are not blocking them from loading.
For more information you can review our Terms of Service and Cookie Policy.', 'Adobe has released Premiere Pro Version 23.0.
As of this release, Premiere Pro no longer includes Legacy Titler.
Flexible alignment controlsLine up text and shape elements with one click when designing titles in the Premiere Pro Program Monitor.
2x Faster Motion Graphics templatesMotion Graphics templates created in After Effects now use Multi-Frame rendering for 2x faster performance.
AAF support for Apple siliconAAF support extends interoperability for Premiere Pro users working on Apple silicon Macs.', 'LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Today, Adobe (Nasdaq:ADBE) announced at Adobe MAX – the world’s largest creativity conference – a partnership between the Content Authenticity Initiative (CAI) and industry-leading camera manufacturers Leica and Nikon to implement provenance technology into two exhibiting cameras: Leica’s iconic M11* Rangefinder and Nikon’s industry-leading mirrorless camera the Nikon Z 9*.
The first available Leica cameras with the C2PA standard are planned to ship in 2023.
“Leica cameras have always stood witness to iconic moments in world history.
About Leica Camera – the partner of photographyLeica Camera AG is an international, premium manufacturer of cameras and sports optics.
Adobe and the Adobe logo are either registered trademarks or trademarks of Adobe in the United States and/or other countries.', "Netflix — The streaming giant's shares skyrocketed more than 14% after the bell Tuesday after the company reported better-than-expected earnings and revenue for the most recent quarter.
Intuitive Surgical — The medical equipment maker jumped 11% after the company reported quarterly earnings and revenue that came in slightly higher than expected, according to FactSet.
United Airlines — The airline saw its shares move higher by more than 6% after-hours following its quarterly results.
Adjusted revenue came in at $847 million, while FactSet estimates put it at $797.6 million.
J.B. Hunt Transport — Shares of the transportation and logistics company gained more than 2% in extended trading following its quarterly earnings report.", 'Video Games Video games are a big part of Microsoft’s success, and here at OnMSFT.com we bring you all the latest in games and gaming news all in one place.
Be sure to check out our gaming features, like our series What to play on Game Pass, and be sure to check out all the latest Xbox news, too!
If you don’t have an Game Pass, you can get one here: [appbox microsoftstore cfq7ttc0khs0 ]', 'Oct 18 (Reuters) - Adobe Inc (ADBE.O) on Tuesday released a set of new software tools designed to make it easier to create three-dimensional digital objects for marketing campaigns, video games and the metaverse.
But in recent years Adobe has also invested in creating three-dimensional content, a field dominated by video-game centric firms like Unity Software Inc (U.N).
But three-dimensional objects have long been labor-intensive for artists to create, and Adobe on Tuesday released two tools designed to make it faster and easier to make the digital objects.
"It's only with augmented reality and with 3D that you can do that," Cottin said.
The second Adobe tool released Tuesday allows artists to switch between editing a three-dimensional object on a desktop computer to manipulating it with their hands in a virtual reality headset.', "The forecast excludes impact from its planned $20 billion acquisition of design software startup Figma, which is expected to close in 2023.
Analysts polled by Refinitiv had expected adjusted earnings of $15.53 per share on $19.82 billion in revenue.
But foreign-exchange rates, which have battered results in technology and other industries, are expected to pull down Adobe's revenue growth by 4 percentage points, the company said.
Adobe said its estimates do factor in macroeconomic conditions, which have brought longer sales cycles for some other technology companies in the past few months, including Qualtrics and Tenable .
The company will probably increase headcount by a lower percentage than it has in the past few years, Narayen told analysts in a meeting at Adobe's Max conference in Los Angeles.", 'New to After Effects are features like Selectable Track Mattes, native H.264 encoding and 50 new presets created by professional designers.
Now, with Selectable Track Mattes, users can apply one matte to as many layers as they want, regardless of where each layer sits in the layer stack.
The new release introduces over 50 new animation presets, built by professionals and designed to make day-to-day tasks easier.
Along with the new animation presets, After Effects 23.0 has new composition presets that make it easier to start new projects.
Native H.264 encodingNew hardware-accelerated native H.264 encoding lets users export H.264 files directly from After Effects.', 'Adobe’s study found that the majority of Australian creators (70%) say the metaverse will bring new job opportunities as it continues to grow.
Meanwhile, 48% of Australian creators, monetise their content, out of which 79% of creators just started monetising content in the past year.
Almost half of the surveyed Gen Z creators said they would rather start their own creative businesses than attend university.
Creators look to advocate social changeDespite pay equity gaps, Australian creators are working ambitiously towards the causes they feel most strongly about.
Data was collected from 5,350 Gen-Pop creators (ages 18+, 600 per market), 5,222 Gen Z creators (ages 16-24, 600 per market).', 'In occasione dell’evento Adobe MAX, Adobe ha annunciato le ultime innovazioni introdotte in Substance 3D, strumento all’avanguardia per creare progetti in 3D.
Le novità Adobe per il 3DDi seguito, alcuni dei miglioramenti alla collezione Substance 3D annunciati in occasione di Adobe MAX 2022:Creazioni 3D con Adobe Substance 3D Modeler: uno strumento rapido e divertente per creare risorse 3D tramite comandi gestuali.
Riproduzione 3D delle texture di superfici reali con Adobe Substance 3D Sampler: disponibile in versione beta, la nuova funzione Capture 3D di Adobe permette ai creator di trasformare in un attimo gli oggetti del mondo reale in risorse 3D.
Progetto “Beyond the Seen” , per creare rapidamente, a partire da una singola immagine, esperienze 3D immersive di realtà virtuale, perfino mappe di profondità 3D modificabili dal creatore.
, per creare rapidamente, a partire da una singola immagine, esperienze 3D immersive di realtà virtuale, perfino mappe di profondità 3D modificabili dal creatore.', 'LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Today, Adobe (Nasdaq:ADBE) announced at Adobe MAX – the world’s largest creativity conference – the expansion of collaboration tools within Adobe Creative Cloud and Document Cloud, enabling new workflows that will empower creators to meet ever-growing content demands across multiple platforms.
To deliver a successful project on deadline, a team needs to share everything from creative inspiration to assets to feedback,” said Scott Belsky, chief product officer and executive vice president, Creative Cloud at Adobe.
Adobe Previews World’s First Camera to Cloud Integration With RED and FujifilmNow used globally by more than 5,000 productions, Adobe Camera to Cloud (powered by Frame.io) ignited the transition from external drives to cloud-based camera workflows, and fundamentally changed the way video is created.
We’re honored to bring this technology to mirrorless digital camera users around the world, and we’re excited to see what comes next.”More PDF Collaboration and ProductivityPDF has been the standard for document-based collaboration for decades.
Adobe and the Adobe logo are either registered trademarks or trademarks of Adobe in the United States and/or other countries.', 'Adobe announces the first cameras to support Frame.io direct RAW uploads Photographers could send photos directly an agency as soon as they're taken.
Eighteen months ago, Adobe announced the "Camera to Cloud" (C2C) feature for its Frame.io cloud collaboration platform that would allow users to upload videos and photo directly from cameras.
Now, it's unveiled the first cameras to support the feature, the RED V-Raptor cinema camera for RAW video, and Fujifilm's new X-H2S mirrorless camera for RAW photos.
In addition, RAW video audio files can be synced, color corrected and transcoded in the cloud, allowing for "proxy" workflows.
Translated to English, that you could transfer small, easy-to-send video files around the world, then link those automatically to much higher-quality RAW video for the final output.', 'VALHALLA, N.Y. -- FUJIFILM North America Corporation is pleased to announce a collaboration with Adobe to develop a new firmware for the FUJIFILM X-H2S digital camera (X-H2S) with FUJIFILM X-H file transmitter battery grip accessory (FT-XH) that will provide the world’s first1 native Camera-to-Cloud (C2C) integration capability for digital still cameras, powered by Frame.io.
For more information please visit: https://fujifilm-x.com/en-us/lp/fujifilm-x-frame-io/FUJIFILM X-H2S mirrorless digital camera: MSRP $2499.95 is available at FUJIFILM authorized dealers now.
About Adobe Camera to CloudSince debuting in 2021, Adobe Camera to Cloud capability (powered by Frame.io) is now used globally by more than 5,000 productions.
Adobe C2C technology will expand to the world of digital still cameras for the first time in spring, 2023, with the release of the updated digital camera firmware for FUJIFILM X-H2S.
FUJIFILM and FUJINON are trademarks of FUJIFILM Corporation and its affiliates.']

title: ['DataCore Streamlines Asset Access With New Perifery Panel for ... - Business Wire', 'Microsoft, Adobe Bring AI Smarts to Mainstream Apps - CDOTrends', "What Is an Adobe Style House? Here's What to Know About the Iconic Desert Style - Yahoo Life", 'Adobe Announces New Camera To Cloud Integrations with RED ... - TV Technology', 'Neu: Adobe Premiere Pro verbessert, After Effects bekommt flexible ... - slashCAM', "Adobe Express - The Vision Of Adobe's One-Stop Shop For Content Creation And Collaboration - Forbes", 'The 4 most mind-blowing future Adobe features announced today - Creative Bloq']
summary:
['NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--DataCore Software announced today the new Perifery Panel for Adobe Premiere Pro.
The Perifery Panel streamlines access to content for DataCore Swarm and Perifery users on Adobe Premiere Pro, significantly improving the efficiency of media production workflows.
Furthermore, the panel allows users to easily drag and drop assets from Perifery appliances and Swarm storage into the Adobe Premiere Pro timeline.
The DataCore Perifery Panel for Adobe Premiere Pro is available as a free download to customers with Perifery-powered appliances or with a DataCore Swarm software license.
DataCore will demonstrate the new Perifery Panel for Adobe Premiere Pro at NAB Show New York, Oct. 19-20 in New York City, at booth 1640.', '', 'At its most basic, the phrase "adobe" actually refers to the method of building Pueblo-style homes, not the architectural style itself.
This building material has deep roots in desert climes, like the indigenous Southwest as well as in the Middle East.
On the exterior of Adobe- or Pueblo-style homes, you'll notice an earthy exterior hue (often some iterations of cream, tan, yellow or pink), with a flat roof and rounded edges.
Exposed wooden beams overhead (also known as vigas) add an architectural element to the space and are often one of the first features replicated in reproduction Adobe- or Pueblo-style homes.
Sarah SolisAdditionally, Adobe-style homes are all about paying respect to the past and tradition, so nothing should feel too new or stark.', 'LOS ANGELES—Adobe has announced a significant expansion of the collaboration tools in the Adobe Creative Cloud and Document Cloud during its Adobe MAX conference.
“Creativity today is a team sport,” said Scott Belsky, chief product officer and executive vice president, Creative Cloud at Adobe.
With Adobe Camera to Cloud, media is automatically transferred from the production set to the cloud so post-production teams can start work immediately on footage.
We’re honored to bring this technology to mirrorless digital camera users around the world, and we’re excited to see what comes next,” he said.
Other Adobe collaboration enhancements announced at the conference include new share and review collaborative capabilities for Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator (available in beta) and additional PDF collaboration and productivity enhancements.', 'Neu: Adobe Premiere Pro verbessert, After Effects bekommt flexible Spurmaskenebenen [13:01 Mi,19.Oktober 2022 [e] von blipVon Adobe Premiere Pro und After Effects sind neue Oktober-Versionen erschienen, die wie immer einige neue Funktionen mitbringen.
Neu in After Effects Version 23.0Das große Highlight für After Effects Motion Designer sind sicherlich die neuen, wählbaren Spurmaskenebenen (Selectable Track Mattes).
Und last but not least wird die neue ARRI ALEXA 35 Kamera in Premiere Pro unterstützt, einschließlich ARRI RAW- und ProRes-Aufnahmeformate.
In After Effects erstellte Animationsvorlagen (MOGRTs) verwenden jetzt Multi-Frame-Rendering, was für eine doppelt so schnelle Leistung sorgen soll.
Und last but not least wird die neue ARRI ALEXA 35 Kamera in Premiere Pro unterstützt, einschließlich ARRI RAW- und ProRes-Aufnahmeformate.', '', 'Hosted by comedian Kevin Hart, this year's event saw Adobe reveal some truly awesome new features and experiments here in LA.
Or, as Dr. Gavin Miller, head of Adobe Research told Creative Bloq, you could call it "the Oscars for Adobe engineers".
"It's really dramatically accelerating high-quality video editing using AI," Miller told Creative Bloq.
Miller told Creative Bloq, “It's like the old idea of taking a few photographs and getting a hologram.
But speaking of AI, it's also clear from MAX 2022 that creatives have concerns about AI image generation – and Adobe knows it.']

title: ['Adobe Demos a Prototype Tool That Can Uncrop Photos Using AI to ... - Gizmodo', 'Frank Lloyd Wright’s Only Adobe Design Is Rescued From Total Disrepair - Dwell', 'Adobe Express innovations make content creation easy and productive - FutureFive New Zealand', 'Figma CEO Dylan Field on why he sold to Adobe - TechCrunch', "Adobe MAX 2022 : quand l'IA booste la productivité des créatifs… - IT for Business"]
summary:
['Have you ever prepped a photo for printing but regretted not being more generous with your framing when snapping the image?
Extending the borders of a photo before digital editing was all but impossible, and it still represents a time-consuming challenge for even Photoshop masters, but a new tool teased by Adobe on Wednesday could make it impossibly easy to “ un crop” a photograph.
Adobe Max, the company’s annual “creativity conference” where it brings artists together to talk about how they use Adobe’s tools, is wrapping up today .
AdvertisementThe Adobe Max ‘Sneaks’ event showcases some of the innovative research the company’s developers have been working on over the past year, while a big-name celebrity oohs and aahs at the various on-stage demonstrations for an hour and a half.
This year Qing Liu revealed a new tool in development called Project All of Me that heavily relies on AI to automatically rebuild missing parts of a photo, allowing an image to be uncropped, and extended on any side, with next to no effort from a user.', 'When Richard Poe first saw Frank Lloyd Wright’s Pottery House in 2016, it was in a desperate state.
"It’s a true adobe house," Helm remarks, "but with cement-based plasters and foam added to achieve the dramatic outlines.
The arched doorframes and other woodwork in vertical grained fir were all rebuilt to Wright’s original specifications.
Richard and Helm rebuilt a radiant floor heating system that was installed underneath the brick floor.
That it was ever built was a miracle of sorts; as Wright’s sole adobe design, it’s a wonder to behold.', "Adobe has shared the latest innovations for Adobe Express at Adobe MAX, the template-based web and mobile tool that allows creators to make, edit and share standout content anywhere, anytime.
Adobe Express provides creators with over 22,000 licensed Adobe Fonts and 193 million assets, including templates and royalty-free Adobe Stock images through Adobe's unparalleled content collection.
Many Adobe Express customers also use Creative Cloud applications or work with designers who do.
Adobe Express streamlines these workflows with Adobe Creative Cloud applications through Adobe Creative Cloud Libraries.
Content Scheduler gives user the ability to collaborate, plan, schedule, preview and publish social media content across platforms from one place.", "We’re in this like product development box right now,'” Dylan said, surely making his media trainers happy with his non-answer.
Asked about any potential pressure from investors, Field denied that this played any role in the sale — especially because Figma continues to double its revenue year over year.
Adobe is paying $20 billion for Figma, though, so let’s see if that changes over time.
Field, for what it’s worth, thinks this is a very offensive move by Adobe, whose XD Figma rival never quite caught on with designers.
And yeah, I don’t think that’s risk-averse in any way.”", 'Elle en réalise alors automatiquement les détourages et les maskings (chaque objet se retrouve sur son propre calque).
Les IA reconnaissent les personnes, les objets, les détails et les isolent…Adobe avait déjà introduit l’an dernier la possibilité de sélectionner un objet d’un clic.
Project BlinkLors d’Adobe Max, l’éditeur a également montré comment ses IA allaient pouvoir s’adapter aussi au monde de la vidéo et ses pistes de recherche en la matière.
Cette IA reconnaît au sein d’une vidéo les personnes, les objets, les pancartes/inscriptions et même les émotions exprimées par les personnages.
Substance 3D Modeler pour modéliser sur Desktop puis éditer et s’immerger en VR…Et là encore, Adobe compte sur l’IA pour se démarquer dans l’univers 3D.']

['', 'The weekly Retail Tech Roundup compiles technology news across the supply chain, manufacturing, retail, e-commerce, logistics and fulfillment sectors.
3D designHugo Boss/AdobeLuxury fashion brand Hugo Boss has partnered with creative software company Adobe to power its 3D and immersive design strategy.
Other applications such as Adobe Substance 3D Painter and Adobe Substance 3D Stager help refine colors and lighting.
The Order Orchestration Tuple offers four composable microservices for the order state engine, order store, manage order APIs and order management.
Via.Delivery has more than 190 pure play e-commerce merchants on its technology platform.', '', "Why did Adobe's stock crash?
Those robust growth rates, along with another $4 billion in buybacks, convinced investors that Adobe's stock deserved to trade at a premium valuation.
At its peak last November, Adobe's stock traded at 55 times the adjusted EPS it would generate in fiscal 2021.
As a result, Adobe now expects its revenue and adjusted EPS to rise just 12% and 9%, respectively, for the full year.
I don't expect Adobe's stock to rally significantly over the next four quarters.", 'Anyone who uses Photoshop has probably heard of Adobe Camera Raw.
You will, however, need photo processing software such as Photoshop, Lightroom or Adobe Camera Raw to edit your images.
Adobe Camera Raw (opens in new tab) has a lot of the same features as Lightroom, so if you’re familiar with that then learning Camer Raw will be a breeze.
To the untrained eye, Adobe Camera Raw is basically just like Lightroom – only it comes with Photoshop.
At first Adobe Camera Raw might seem confusing, but it’s a really useful, powerful tool that when used correctly can save you time in the long run – it’s much easier to apply all these edits in Camera Raw.']

More information about LIGHTSPEED STUDIOS please visit www.lightspeed-studios.com , and follow us on Twitter , Facebook and YouTube .", 'Adobe’s annual creativity conference, Adobe MAX, brings together the world’s top creatives and best-in-the-business experts to be inspired, learn new skills, discover new and upcoming offerings from Adobe, and of course, play.
Adobe MAX 2022.

MAX Sneaks Multiverse.
And that’s a wrap for this year’s Adobe MAX!', 'Hugo Boss deploys software to power 3D design strategyHugo Boss is working with software company ADOBE to explore new customer experiences that blend the digital and physical worlds.
Applications within Adobe Substance 3D have enabled Hugo Boss to drive innovation in the space of 3D and immersive design and create new workflows that take products from concept to streets in new ways.

So, with Designer, Microsoft is trying to simplify the design task while simultaneously helping the designer create something unique through AI.
These two characteristics are leading to intense competition in the space with the likes of Canva, Adobe (with Adobe Express), and now Microsoft.
Based on the description above, it should already be quite clear to what segment Microsoft Create caters to: the non-professionals.
So, how will the competitive landscape evolve after the launch of Adobe Express and Microsoft Designer?', 'While there are many tools that can help you amplify your design, none is quite so powerful as the Adobe Creative Cloud.
Right now, you can learn this leading software suite with The 2022 Ultimate Adobe CC Beginner to Advanced Training Bundle included in our overstock deals, available from October 24 to October 31.

Take advantage of this overstock deal on The 2022 Ultimate Adobe CC Beginner to Advanced Training Bundle, available until October 31.', 'With so many touchpoints, the Adobe Experience Platform (AEP) will help deliver a single view of the customer, providing the marketing organization greater precision in providing timely and appropriate content through the right channel.
With Adobe’s Real-Time Customer Data Platform (Real-Time CDP), part of AEP, U.S. Bank can support highly personalized experiences in moments that matter.
With Adobe’s Real-Time Customer Data Platform (Real-Time CDP), part of AEP, U.S. Bank can support highly personalized experiences in moments that matter.

Adobe and the Adobe logo are either registered trademarks or trademarks of Adobe in the United States and/or other countries.', 'SAN JOSE, CA — Natalie Kessler, who most recently led Adobe’s global talent acquisition initiatives, has joined The Hoffman Agency to oversee the agency’s new global talent marketing practice.
Kessler is charged with creating and overseeing the practice, designed to help companies in talent acquisition and employee branding.
Kessler joins Hoffman after more than 16 years at Adobe, the last two of which she spent as director of global talent marketing and employer brand.
She previously served as head of talent marketing.
Their challenge in attracting technical talent is even greater because technical innovation is not typically baked into the brand.”', 'Updates released by Adobe last week for its Illustrator product patch two vulnerabilities that could lead to arbitrary code execution, but the researcher who found them says exploitation is not easy.
According to Adobe, Illustrator 2021 and 2022 for Windows and macOS are affected by improper input validation and out-of-bounds read vulnerabilities that could lead to malicious code execution.
This is the seventh round of Illustrator updates announced by Adobe in 2022.
Nearly all of the previous updates addressed critical arbitrary code execution vulnerabilities.

The NNFM involves the comparison between the feature maps of both rendered and style images, extracted using the notorious VGG-16 Convolutional Neural Network (CNN).

title: ["Canvas's Cliff Obrecht claims Adobe is copying 'everything' - The Australian Financial Review", 'How to Create a Spider Web in Adobe Illustrator - MUO - MakeUseOf', 'Adobe MAX 2022: Changing Lanes - CreativePro Network', 'How Adobe built an all-electric office tower - GreenBiz', 'Using Adaptive Presets for portraits in Adobe Lightroom Classic - Photofocus', 'How to fix Adobe Configuration Errors 1, 15 or 16 - TheWindowsClub']
summary:
['Canva did not immediately respond to a request for comment over whether Mr Obrecht’s claims were serious or to verify whether the company had received job applications from Adobe employees each week.
AdvertisementOn October 12, Canva said it had 100 million monthly active users across 190 different countries, as its new Canva Whiteboard, Canva Docs, Canva Visual Worksuite and Canva Website products crank growth.
Canva was co-founded in 2012 by chief product officer, Cameron Adams, Mr Obrecht and Melanie Perkins, who is its chief executive.
Franklin Templeton cut its Canva valuation in June after owning the shares for just six months.
Australian venture capital funds Airtree, Square Peg, and Blackbird followed suit in July, cutting the company’s valuation by 36 per cent to $US25.6 billion.', '', 'Adobe MAX 2022: Changing LanesThis article appeared in This article appeared in Issue 13 of CreativePro Magazine.
In October 2022, the annual Adobe MAX conference returned with both live and online sessions, rolling out the latest Creative Cloud apps and services.
When I covered MAX last year, I noted that three of the themes driving new features were collaboration, creativity, and machine learning.
This year Adobe doubled down on all three of those themes.
This year, I think it’s important to flip that around and first talk about the industry trends motivating Adobe toward the feature sets they’re adding simultaneously across multiple Creative Cloud apps and services.', 'When Adobe began designing its new corporate office tower in 2018, the company knew it had the opportunity to make some bold choices.
Nearly three years on, however, the pandemic has not changed much about Adobe’s new North Tower headquarters in downtown San Jose, California.
"The decision to make an all-electric North Tower had the biggest impact on this goal," said Scott Hiller, Adobe’s head of sustainability and energy infrastructure.
Powering an office building entirely with electricity, however, is not without its challenges.
For example, Adobe opted to install air source heat pumps, rather than furnaces, to handle the heating and cooling of the North Tower.', 'Where to find Adaptive Portrait presetsThe Adaptive Portraits presets can be found in your presets list once you’ve updated to Lightroom Classic 12.0.
Then, you will find the Adaptive Portrait presets on the left side panel of the Develop Module.
The eight Adaptive Portrait presetsBefore and after: Subtle but key differences when the Enhance Portrait, Enhance Eyes and Texture Hair Adaptive Portrait presets are applied.
Overall, the Adaptive Portrait presets come as a welcome addition to the Lightroom Classic toolbox.
So go ahead and play around with the new Adaptive Portrait presets to see how they work for you!', 'Fix Adobe Configuration Errors 1, 15 or 16The Adobe configuration errors 1,15, 16 happen when you attempt to launch a Creative Cloud app.
You may have to go back one folder (the Adobe folder), then right-click on the SLStore folder, or since you are inside the SLStore folder you can just right-click on a blank spot.
You will notice that you are right inside the Adobe PCD folder, you can go back one folder (the Adobe folder) and right-click on the Adobe PCD folder or just right-click a blank space inside the Adobe PCD folder.
Read: How to use Adobe Creative Cloud Cleaner ToolWhat can cause the Adobe configuration errors 1, 15, and 16?
The Adobe configuration errors 1, 15, 16 can be caused when permissions to application folders (Adobe PCD and SLStore) are not configured properly.']

title: ['Your company brand may soon be held hostage to Adobe, Pantone (u) - Computerworld', 'Pantone colors now require a subscription in Adobe Photoshop - The Verge', 'Adobe Creative Commons Grand Opening set for Nov. 9 - UNM Newsroom']
summary:
['After November, the only Pantone Color books remaining for use without a license will be Pantone + CMYK Coated, Pantone + CMYK Uncoated, and Pantone + Metallic Coated.
But under a new arrangement, Adobe customers must now take out a separate subscription for a Pantone license.
By extension, every single partner with which your company works that need access to your brand assets will face the same problem.
To access the complete set of Pantone Color Books, Pantone now requires customers to purchase a premium license through Pantone Connect and install a plug-in using Adobe Exchange.
"Adobe Creative Cloud empowers creators with flagship apps like Photoshop, Illustrator etc.', 'Last week, Adobe removed support for free Pantone colors across its Photoshop, InDesign, and Illustrator Creative Cloud applications.
“To access the complete set of Pantone Color Books, Pantone now requires customers to purchase a premium license through Pantone Connect and install a plug-in using Adobe Exchange.”Pantone has claimed that its color libraries inside of Adobe have not been properly maintained for several years, leading to the Pantone colors being inaccurate, with hundreds missing from Adobe applications altogether.
A dedicated (and seemingly outdated) Pantone FAQ says, “Pantone and Adobe have together decided to remove the outdated libraries and jointly focus on an improved in-app experience that better serves our users.”Creatives who understandably want to continue using the industry-standard color system are expected to pay a $15 monthly / $90 annual subscription for a Pantone license via the Adobe Pantone Connect plugin.
While the Pantone FAQ states that “existing Creative Cloud files and documents containing Pantone Color references will keep those color identities and information,” Photoshop users are nevertheless reporting that their old PSD files utilizing Pantone colors now show those colors as black.
“This file has Pantone colors that have been removed and replaced with black due to changes in Pantone’s licensing with Adobe,” reads a message on affected projects.', 'The Adobe Creative Commons grand opening will be an open house with demonstrations, refreshments, and free giveaways throughout the space and will also feature speakers from Adobe, UNM Information Technologies, UNM University Libraries at 12:15 p.m. to celebrate the new resource space.
The Adobe Creative Commons provides resources including high-powered computers, several secluded editing bays, two fully equipped audio booths, and a wide variety of audio-visual equipment available for checkout.
All of the computers are equipped with Adobe Creative Cloud apps and services to help students create.
Digital skills are for everyone, whether your field is in the arts, STEM, or somewhere in between,” said Dayna Diamond, multimedia development specialist for the Adobe Creative Commons.
“The newly established Adobe Creative Commons puts into play a high-end physical environment with equipment and staffing to provide our students, faculty and staff with critical resources to better leverage the Adobe Creative Cloud tools.']

title: ['Is Adobe Stock a Buy Now? - The Motley Fool', "DOJ takes aim at Adobe's $20 billion deal - POLITICO"]
summary:
["However, with the sell-off, Adobe's stock is cheaper than ever since switching to an SaaS model nearly a decade ago.
At 50 times sales, the price Adobe paid for Figma reminds many investors of the highly inflated tech stock valuations of 2021 that came crashing down in 2022.
At face value, it looks like Adobe overpaid, but after digging deeper, it became clearer why Adobe had to pay a premium.
By purchasing Figma, Adobe instantly obtains the collaboration technology to improve Adobe XD and all of its other design products.
Adobe's stock is the cheapest it has been in some timeLost in its Figma acquisition announcement were Adobe's solid Q3 results.", 'In mid-September, Adobe announced its deal for Figma, a collaboration tool with fierce loyalty among designers, who were quick to voice concerns.
The DOJ has the discretion to open a longer, optional review period if it has concerns a deal will harm competition.
While Figma does not compete with core Adobe products such as Photoshop and Indesign, it quickly surpassed Adobe’s own collaboration software, Adobe XD, after the company launched in 2012.
Figma has far surpassed Adobe in collaboration tools for designers, said Tadhg McCarthy, chief design officer at digital product consultancy Elsewhen.
“Figma is a leader in the product design market, focused on building a collaborative web platform.']

title: ["How Canon, Adobe, and Fujifilm's Video Ads Reveal Business ... - PetaPixel", 'Bloomington startup debuts robots that build adobe walls - The Herald-Times']
summary:
['Canon is about to make a return to television advertising for the first time in nine years as it attempts to boost widespread product awareness of its printers, scanners, and webcam software.
Outlined in a report from Digiday, the company says that its goals for returning to broadcast television is to increase customer awareness of its brand beyond just cameras.
Digiday says that Canon’s spend has been spread across social media, influencer marketing, and digital video ads, but that is poised to change.
“We haven’t been as out there, potentially as in the past,” Canon’s director of marketing and service, Kevin Price, tells Digiday, referring to advertising on broadcast television.
The camera company has been producing video advertisements for the last couple of years that are very much targeted at camera enthusiasts specifically but have limited reach to just the company’s YouTube channel.', "The five men who created Terran Robotics believe their adobe construction process offers a viable and cost-effective solution to the soaring cost of owning a home.
It's mostly high labor costs and time that make adobe construction an unlikely choice for builders beyond the southwestern part of the country, Ely explained.
Funds from the grant also financed development of a lightweight 3D printer used to create components for adobe construction.
Simplifying the construction process will allow developers to build quicker and at a lower cost.
From there, it's on to the local housing market, just like the NSF plan details."]

After nearly three years, the Adobe Creative Commons opened to student, faculty and staff imaginations on the first floor of the Zimmerman Library on Nov. 9.
The equipment, workshops, and tech support have all become a reality with the continued Adobe collaboration, as well as efforts by UNM University Libraries, and UNM Information Technologies.
The Creative Commons also features the Lobo Brain Bar – an IT service desk to help community members with basic operating system support.
For more information about the resources available now inside Zimmerman visit Adobe Creative Commons.', 'Convert Adobe Illustrator vectors to editable PowerPoint graphics At Adobe MAX 2022, we were able to demonstrate IR2Office 2023, and its integration with Adobe Illustrator 2023 gaining tremendous feedback about the product - Paramjit Chadha, MD, Recosoft CorporationIR2Office 2023 supports Adobe Illustrator 2023 and includes several important refinements when exporting Illustrator artworks and vector graphics to Microsoft PowerPoint and Apple Keynote formats.

Adobe, InDesign, Illustrator and Creative Cloud are either registered trademarks or trademarks of Adobe in the US and/or other countries.', 'Rejecting age-based stereotypes, the majority (80%) of consumers in India want to be treated as an individual with unique interests and preferences, as per a new research by Adobe.
Adobe has announced the results of the new research revealing the growing importance of brands understanding customers at a personal level - and interacting with them as individuals, in real-time.
When asked, 55% of Indian consumers said they have changed their favourite brands as their tastes and financial situation has changed.
Interestingly, 83% of Indian consumers believe they will advocate for brands that offer consistent, personalised experiences confirming that brands can win customer loyalty with personalised experiences.
Meeting consumers where they areAdobe Real-Time CDP empowers brands to continually meet members of this new generation where they are.']

By clicking “Accept All”, you consent to the use of ALL the cookies.
However, you may visit "Cookie Settings" to provide a controlled consent.', 'Consumer online spending jumped in October, while overall online prices continued to decline, according to reports from the Adobe Digital Price Index and Adobe Analytics.
Driven in part by generous discounts, especially in electronics and toys, economic pressures did not depress consumer online spending YoY.

This was driven in part by decreased prices for electronics and toys; indeed a sharp 12.9% YoY drop in electronics prices is the largest seen for the category since Adobe started tracking online prices in 2014.', '"After record spending on physical goods in the first two years of the pandemic, we see consumers shifting more significantly towards services such as air travel," Adobe Digital Insights lead analyst Vivek Pandya said in a statement.
